message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to go up to $8,500. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I value your offer, the product's worth to me is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $11,000.
